title: JSC Novopavlovka Directio Rusian of the Army Shelled Krasnogorivka, St. George, Paraskovivka, Ugelar of Donetsk Region. Rusia ...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Oleksandropil, Katerynivka, Yelyzavetivka, Velyka Novosilka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
